name: Datum RL supplied by surveyor, pour height marked
Request Sign Off from Site Engineer
Placement of column box over cage
Final sign off - Columns completed as per the above ITP - Add general photos/comments below
HOLDPOINT - Once all above items have been signed off work may proceed
Confirm Surveyor is out next day to carry out survey of finished concrete Attach As built Survey Plan
Confirm tolerance of finished concrete surfaces are in accordance with the specifications
Confirm saw joints are installed to engineers requirements
Confirm finish of concrete is adequate for application (broom/trowel/helicopter finish), refer to AS3610
Obtain all concrete tests at 1 day, and attach test results
Confirm initial stress is conducted day after the pour, after concrete has reached 10MPa on 1 Day results
Obtain all concrete tests at 4 day, and attach test results
Confirm final stress has occurred after concrete has reached 20MPa, and attach Stressing Records
Obtain all concrete tests at 7 day, and attach test results
Obtain all concrete tests at 28 day, and attach test results
Attach Subcontractor ITP - Attached below as applicable
